name: Days Rations For All
description: A collection of dried, long-life food - suitable for feeding six people for one day.

name: Scrap Metal
description: A collection of various metal scraps - useful for crafting.

name: Mars/The Rover
description: A Rover sent alongside you.

name: Bundle of Sticks
description: A collection of various wooden sticks - useful for crafting.

name: Poorly-made Axe
description: A weak hand-made axe.

name: Poorly-made Dagger
description: A weak hand-made dagger.

name: Basic Light Outfit
description: A basic hand-made outfit. Airy and light, build for warm weather. Something like a vest and shorts, but your choice.

name: Basic Warm Clothes
description: A basic hand-made outfit. Bulky and warm, build for cold weather. Something like a coat and thermal pants, but your choice.

name: Days Rations Of Water
description: A jug of purified water - suitable for hydrating six people for one day.

name: Jar Of Water
description: A jar of purified water - suitable for hydrating one people for one day.

name: Rope (6mm)
description: A thin rope, about 6mm wide.

name: Rope (12mm)
description: A medium rope, about 12mm wide.

name: Rope (30mm)
description: A thick rope, about 30mm wide.

name: Poorly-made Rope Sling
description: A weak hand-made rope sling.

name: Poorly-made Spear
description: A weak hand-made spear.

name: Poorly-made Hammer
description: A weak hand-made hammer.

name: Poorly-made Cooking Pot
description: A weak hand-made cooking pot. Good for boiling and mixing.

name: Poorly-made Cooking Pan
description: A weak hand-made cooking pan. Good for cooking and frying.

name: Poorly-made Shield
description: A weak hand-made shield.

name: Poorly-made Armour
description: Weak hand-made leather armour.

name: Bundle of Red Flowers
description: A bundle of a few red flowers. Loved by flufftails, makes a pretty good tea.

name: Thread
description: A thin thread which can be used for sewing.

name: Sewing Kit
description: A simple sewing kit. Sent with you to Space.

name: Animal Horn
description: An animal (or creature) horn.

name: Large Meat Chunk
description: A large chunk of meat from an animal. Can be cooked.

name: Medium Meat Chunk
description: A medium chunk of meat from an animal. Can be cooked.

name: Small Meat Chunk
description: A small chunk of meat from an animal. Can be cooked.

name: Large Pelt
description: A large pelt from an animal. Can be processed into leather.

name: Medium Pelt
description: A medium pelt from an animal. Can be processed into leather.

name: Small Pelt
description: A small pelt from an animal. Can be processed into leather.

name: Unpurified Fat
description: Fat from an animal. Needs to be purified before use.

name: Purified Fat
description: Purified fat. Has many uses.

name: Bones
description: Bones from an animal.

name: Bundle of Blue Mushrooms
description: A bundle of a few blue mushrooms. Glows. Doesn't seem edible.

name: T-1 Flux User Manual
description: A manual on how to use the 'T-1 FLUX' tower.

name: Bundle of Various Screws
description: A bundle of various screws of different shapes and sizes.

name: Bundle of Grass
description: A bundle of grass, reeds and straw.

name: Bundle of Thatch
description: A bundle of thatch. Can be used for housing.

name: log
description: A sturdy section of a log.

name: Wooden Planks
description: Processed wooden planks. Can be used for housing.

name: Jar of Sugar
description: A jar of purified sugar.

name: Jar of Ethanol
description: A jar of purified ethanol. Technically edible, but has better uses.

name: Jar of Vinegar
description: A jar of purified Vinegar.

name: Jar of Pickled Blues
description: A jar of fruit and/or veg - pickled in vinegar. Long-lasting.

name: Jerky
description: Dried, long-lasting, salted meat.

name: Jar of Salt
description: A jar of purified salt.

name: Charcoal
description: A pile of charcoal. Non-activated.

name: Ash
description: A pile of ash.

name: Solid Lye
description: A pile of dried, solid lye. Makes soap. Irritant.

name: Soap
description: A pile of dried, solid soap. Cleans things.

name: Fabric
description: Dry, clean fabric made from woven plant fibers.

name: Leather
description: Dry, clean leather made from a dried animal pelt.

name: Tannin
description: Extracted tannin from tree bark.

name: Playing Cards
description: Basic 52-card deck. Sent with you to space.

name: Book
description: Various books, some may or may not be about tragic early 2000's events and/or woman-loving-woman plotlines. Sent with you to space.

name: Pencil
description: Standard pencils. Sent with you to space.

name: Pen
description: Standard pens. Sent with you to space.

name: Eraser
description: Standard eraser. Sent with you to space.

name: Sentimental Photo
description: Sent with you to space. It reminds you what you're surviving for.

name: Herbal Sprig Necklace
description: A necklace fused with energy from naturally occuring magic. Sent with you to space.

name: Notebook
description: A notebook or sketchbook, good for noting things down. Sent with you to space.

name: Dinosaur Toy
description: Dinonaurrr !!!! Rawwr !!! Sent with you to space.

name: Viol
description: a viola da gamba, because a violin would be too simple. Sent with you to space.
